scripts.build:simple: echo 'Building application...' && npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:check
scripts.build:copy: cp -r *.js routes controllers public dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Some files not found, continuing...'
scripts.build:check: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); console.log(fs.existsSync('dist/server.js') ? '✅ Build successful!' : '❌ Build failed!');"
